critique: The document is an executive order regarding land use in California. As the President, the primary emotions I want to elicit are related to stability, confidence in governance, and perhaps a sense of security due to fire prevention measures. There isn't strong emotional language, so the scores will be relatively low. Joy might be present in a very mild form due to the preservation and efficient use of resources. Sadness, anger, disgust are unlikely to be elicited. Fear might be slightly reduced due to fire prevention. Surprise is unlikely.
